indicator_name: Index for digital empowerment in women (a multi-dimensional index that includes access to devices, connection, knowledge, the type of tools used, the reason for use, e.g. the percentage of women users of Decidim)

barcelona_target: By 2030, achieve gender equality in the use of ICTs
national_indicator_available: Index for digital empowerment in women (a multi-dimensional index that includes access to devices, connection, knowledge, the type of tools used, the reason for use, e.g. the percentage of women users of Decidim)
target_line_2030: Progressively increase the index of digital empowerment in women. Target value 2030: Pending definition
target_name: Improve the use of instrumental technology, in particular information and communication technologies, in order to foster the empowerment of women
